name: Chino & Nacho
description: '''Chino & Nacho''' is a Venezuelan [[pop music|pop]] duo, consisting of [[Chyno Miranda|Jesús Alberto Miranda Pérez]] (Chino) (born November 15, 1984) and [[Nacho (singer)|Miguel Ignacio Mendoza Donatti]] (Nacho) (born August 22, 1983). In 2010, the group won a [[Latin Grammy]] for Best Urban Album for ''[[Mi Niña Bonita]]''.
